official_title: A bill to provide that dams shall not be considered point sources for purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to provide that dams or structures intended to impound water shall not be considered point sources, unless such dams and structures are intended to treat or contain pollutants or toxic pollutants.

titles.title: A bill to provide that dams shall not be considered point sources for purposes of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
